comments.comments_text: The corner kick from Nicolas Pepe (Arsenal) is headed out of the penalty area by one of the defenders.

comments.comments_text: Erik Lamela fires in a promising shot which ricochets off the goalkeeper back to Christian Eriksen (Tottenham) inside the box and he sends the ball into the back of the net. The score is 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Bernd Leno comes off his line to intercept the corner from Christian Eriksen (Tottenham).

comments.comments_text: Nicolas Pepe (Arsenal) takes the corner kick and sends a lovely ball into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and knocks the ball to safety.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner kick and sends a lovely ball into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and knocks the ball to safety.

comments.comments_text: Danny Rose (Tottenham) shouldn't be surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the situation down well.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) shouldn't be surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the situation down well.

comments.comments_text: Nicolas Pepe (Arsenal) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away. Arsenal have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner, taken by Nicolas Pepe (Arsenal), comes to nothing.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting corner, taken by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), comes to nothing.

comments.comments_text: Erik Lamela (Tottenham) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Martin Atkinson had an easy-decision to make.

comments.comments_text: Christian Eriksen (Tottenham) quickly takes the corner kick with a short pass.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Alexandre Lacazette (Arsenal) beautifully controls a strongly hit pass from Nicolas Pepe inside the box. He cuts inside his marker and rifles the ball into the top left corner. 1:2.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Alexandre Lacazette (Arsenal) was quite harsh and Martin Atkinson didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) meets a perfect cross from Matteo Guendouzi deep inside the box and controls it with a nice first touch. He produces an accurate strike into the bottom left corner. The score is 2:2.

comments.comments_text: Sead Kolasinac (Arsenal) receives a pass then lets rip from long range towards the left of the goal, but Hugo Lloris watches it all the way and makes an easy save.
